q: Which HTML element is used to embed a video file?
What is the output of the following HTML snippet?
c:
<video width="320" height="240" controls>
  <source src="video.mp4" type="video/mp4">
  Your browser does not support the video tag.
</video>
o: A video player with controls to play 'video.mp4'
A broken link since 'video.mp4' is missing
A text message saying 'Your browser does not support the video tag.'
